.Valid Usage (Implicit)
****
* [[VUID-VkPhysicalDeviceExternalImageFormatInfo-sType-sType]] pname:sType must: be ename:VK_STRUCTURE_TYPE_PHYSICAL_DEVICE_EXTERNAL_IMAGE_FORMAT_INFO
